mapper.select: select r.U_STU_NO as studentNo, e.E_NO as enrollNo, e.E_ENROLLTIME as enrollTime, e.E_ENROLLDAY as enrollDay, j.J_SUBJECT_NAME as subjectName, j.J_NO as subjectNo from e_enrollment e, r_regisubject r, j_subject j where e.E_NO = r.E_NO and e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = j.J_NO and r.U_STU_NO = #{studentNo}

select r.U_STU_NO as studentNo, e.E_NO as enrollNo, e.E_ENROLLTIME as enrollTime, e.E_ENROLLDAY as enrollDay, j.J_SUBJECT_NAME as subjectName, j.J_NO as subjectNo from e_enrollment e, r_regisubject r, j_subject j where e.E_NO = r.E_NO and e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = j.J_NO and r.U_STU_NO = #{studentNo}

select B.E_NO as enrollNo, B.E_ENROLLTIME as enrollTime, B.E_ENROLLDAY as enrollDay, A.J_SUBJECT_NAME as subjectName, A.J_NO as subjectNo from j_subject A, e_enrollment B where A.J_NO = B.E_J_subject_no and j_sub_prof = #{value}
